question: In which year Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose founded Forward block?
explanation: Netaji Subhas Chandra Bose resigned from Indian National Congress Presidentship on April 29,1939 and formed All India Forward Bloc (AIFB) in Calcutta in the same year. The first All India Conference of Forward bloc was held in 1940 at Nagpur, where Subhash Chandra Bose gave a concrete plan of action for winning Puma Swaraj or complete freedom in the immediate future.
